description: This file defines a Button component using the LightningJs framework, including its template, state management, and input handling.

classes.name: Button
classes.description: A LightningJS component representing a button with toggleable favorite state.

methods.name: template
methods.description: Defines the HTML structure and data binding for the Button component.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component's reactive state variables.

methods.name: input.enter
methods.description: Handles the 'enter' input action to toggle the 'isFavorited' state.
